xuiToastService
service in module xui

Description

Service that provides toastr notifications.

Methods

  • clear()

    Clears all toast messages.

  • error(message, title, options, itemsToHighlight)

    Displays a message with "error" stylings based on the parameters provided. Note that error toast messages are always displayed in the top-right corner.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    messagestring

    Text displayed in the body of the message.

    title
    (optional)
    		string

    Title of the message.

    options
    (optional)
    		IToastOptions

    Options to taylor the message.

    itemsToHighlight
    (optional)
    		any

    To be highlighted while the message is displayed.

  • info(message, title, options, itemsToHighlight)

    Displays an informational message based on the parameters provided.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    messagestring

    Text displayed in the body of the message.

    title
    (optional)
    		string

    Title of the message.

    options
    (optional)
    		IToastOptions

    Options to tailor the message.

    itemsToHighlight
    (optional)
    		any

    To be highlighted while the message is displayed.

  • success(Message, title, options, itemsToHighlight)

    Displays a message with "success" stylings based on the parameters provided.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    Messagestring

    text displayed in the body of the message.

    title
    (optional)
    		string

    Title of the message.

    options
    (optional)
    		IToastOptions

    Options to tailor the message.

    itemsToHighlight
    (optional)
    		any

    To be highlighted while the message is displayed.

  • warning(message, title, options, itemsToHighlight)

    Displays a message with "warning" stylings based on the parameters provided.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    messagestring

    Text displayed in the body of the message.

    title
    (optional)
    		string

    Title of the message.

    options
    (optional)
    		IToastOptions

    Options to tailor the message.

    itemsToHighlight
    (optional)
    		any

    To be highlighted while the message is displayed.
